web_snippets: Marc J. Dunkelman is a fellow in International and Public Affairs. His work at Brown focuses on the architecture of American community.
Marc J. Dunkelman is a fellow at Brown University's Watson Institute for International and Public Affairs and a former fellow at NYU's Marron Institute of Urban ...
Marc J. Dunkelman is a Fellow in Public Policy at Brown University's A. Alfred Taubman Center for Public Policy and American Institutions.
